data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Galli, Loris, Capurro, Matteo, Lionetti, Giuseppe, Zinni, Matteo (2017): Acerentulus tortii sp. nov. from Greece (Protura: Acerentomidae). Zootaxa 4232 (3): 437-443, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4232.3.12
